document.full_text: federal regulators are investigating 865,000 general motors co  sport utility vehicles for potential faulty fuel gauges that could mistakenly tell drivers their vehicles have more gas than they do.
document.title: gm suvs probed for bad fuel gauges
lines_and_colors: federal regulators are investigating 865,000 general motors co  sport utility vehicles for potential faulty fuel gauges that could mistakenly tell drivers their vehicles have more gas than they do.
